00040 using System;
00041 using MathNet.Numerics.RandomSources;
00042 
00043 namespace MathNet.Numerics.Distributions
00044 {
00053     public sealed class GammaDistribution : ContinuousDistribution
00054     {
00055         double _alpha;
00056         double _theta;
00057         double _helper1;
00058         double _helper2;
00059         double _lngammaAlpha;
00060         double _alphaLnTheta;
00061 
00062         #region Construction
00063 
00064 
00065 
00066 
00067         public
00068         GammaDistribution()
00069             : base()
00070         {
00071             SetDistributionParameters(1.0, 1.0);
00072         }
00073 
00082         public
00083         GammaDistribution(
00084             RandomSource random
00085             )
00086             : base(random)
00087         {
00088             SetDistributionParameters(1.0, 1.0);
00089         }
00090 
00095         public
00096         GammaDistribution(
00097             double alpha,
00098             double theta
00099             )
00100             : base()
00101         {
00102             SetDistributionParameters(alpha, theta);
00103         }
00104         #endregion
00105 
00106         #region Distribution Parameters
00107 
00108 
00109 
00110         public double Alpha
00111         {
00112             get { return _alpha; }
00113             set { SetDistributionParameters(value, _theta); }
00114         }
00115 
00119         public double Theta
00120         {
00121             get { return _theta; }
00122             set { SetDistributionParameters(_alpha, value); }
00123         }
00124 
00128         public
00129         void
00130         SetDistributionParameters(
00131             double alpha,
00132             double theta
00133             )
00134         {
00135             if(!IsValidParameterSet(alpha, theta))
00136             {
00137                 throw new ArgumentException(Properties.Resources.ArgumentParameterSetInvalid);
00138             }
00139 
00140             _alpha = alpha;
00141             _theta = theta;
00142             _helper1 = alpha - Math.Floor(alpha);
00143             _helper2 = Math.E / (Math.E + _helper1);
00144             _lngammaAlpha = Fn.GammaLn(alpha);
00145             _alphaLnTheta = alpha * Math.Log(theta);
00146         }
00147 
00154         public static
00155         bool
00156         IsValidParameterSet(
00157             double alpha,
00158             double theta
00159             )
00160         {
00161             return (alpha > 0) && (theta > 0);
00162         }
00163         #endregion
00164 
00165         #region Distribution Properties
00166 
00167 
00168 
00169         public override double Minimum
00170         {
00171             get { return 0.0; }
00172         }
00173 
00177         public override double Maximum
00178         {
00179             get { return double.MaxValue; }
00180         }
00181 
00185         public override double Mean
00186         {
00187             get { return _alpha * _theta; }
00188         }
00189 
00193         public override double Median
00194         {
00195             get { return double.NaN; }
00196         }
00197 
00201         public override double Variance
00202         {
00203             get { return _alpha * _theta * _theta; }
00204         }
00205 
00209         public override double Skewness
00210         {
00211             get { return 2.0 / Math.Sqrt(_alpha); }
00212         }
00213 
00217         public override
00218         double
00219         ProbabilityDensity(
00220             double x
00221             )
00222         {
00223             return Math.Exp((_alpha - 1) * Math.Log(x) - x / _theta - _lngammaAlpha - _alphaLnTheta);
00224         }
00225 
00229         public override
00230         double
00231         CumulativeDistribution(
00232             double x
00233             )
00234         {
00235             return Fn.GammaRegularized(_alpha, x / _theta);
00236         }
00237         #endregion
00238 
00239         #region Generator
00240 
00241 
00242 
00243 
00244         public override
00245         double
00246         NextDouble()
00247         {
00248             double xi, eta, gen1, gen2;
00249             do
00250             {
00251                 gen1 = 1.0 - this.RandomSource.NextDouble();
00252                 gen2 = 1.0 - this.RandomSource.NextDouble();
00253                 if(gen1 <= _helper2)
00254                 {
00255                     xi = Math.Pow(gen1 / _helper2, 1.0 / _helper1);
00256                     eta = gen2 * Math.Pow(xi, _helper1 - 1.0);
00257                 }
00258                 else
00259                 {
00260                     xi = 1.0 - Math.Log((gen1 - _helper2) / (1.0 - _helper2));
00261                     eta = gen2 * Math.Pow(Math.E, -xi);
00262                 }
00263             } while(eta > Math.Pow(xi, _helper1 - 1.0) * Math.Pow(Math.E, -xi));
00264 
00265             for(int i = 1; i <= _alpha; i++)
00266             {
00267                 xi -= Math.Log(this.RandomSource.NextDouble());
00268             }
00269 
00270             return xi * _theta;
00271         }
00272         #endregion
00273     }
00274 }
